remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowAbsolute`|`true`若要将行作为绝对引用返回, 则为; 否则为。否则为`false`。`true` to return the row as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ColumnAbsolute`|`true`若要将列作为绝对引用返回, 则为; 否则为。否则为`false`。`true` to return the column as an absolute reference; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ReferenceStyle`| 值之一。One of the values.| |`External`|`true`返回外部引用;`false`返回本地引用。`true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.| |`RelativeTo`|定义起始点的。A that defines the starting point. 如果`RowAbsolute` 和`ColumnAbsolute`为 ,则必须包含相对引用的起始点。 `ReferenceStyle` `false`If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is , you must include a starting point for the relative reference.| 如果尝试在不指定任何参数的情况下使用, 将获取一个对象, 该对象是 Visual Studio 基础结构中的 Office 开发工具的一部分, 不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性显示的范围位置。 The following code example uses the property to display the range location of an . 该`ReferenceStyle`示例使用`RowAbsolute` 、和`RelativeTo`参数的不同组合以四种不同格式显示范围位置。 `ColumnAbsolute`The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. 如果`CustomerLastNameCell`位于单元格 A2, 则示例将显示地址字符串 "$A $2"、"$A 2"、"R2C2" 和 "R [-1] C [-1]"。If `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "R2C2", and "R[-1]C[-1]". Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性显示的范围位置。 The following code example uses the property to display the range location of an . 该`ReferenceStyle`示例使用`RowAbsolute` 、和`RelativeTo`参数的不同组合以四种不同格式显示范围位置。 `ColumnAbsolute`The example uses different combinations of the `ReferenceStyle`, `RowAbsolute`, `ColumnAbsolute` and `RelativeTo` parameters to display the range location in four different formats. 位置字符串将根据运行它的系统的语言进行本地化。The location strings will be localized according to the language of the system it is run on. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. 如果该示例在使用德语语言支持的系统上运行, `CustomerLastNameCell`并且位于单元格 A2, 则该示例将显示地址字符串 "$A $2"、"$A 2"、"Z2S2" 和 "Z [-1] S [-1]"。If the example is run on a system using German language support and `CustomerLastNameCell` is at cell A2, the example will display the address strings "$A$2", "$A2", "Z2S2", and "Z[-1]S[-1]". summary.span: 基于 OLAP 数据源为 XML 映射范围内的所有已编辑单元格执行写回操作。

span.span: Performs a writeback operation for all edited cells in an XML mapped range based on an OLAP data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将对 XML 映射范围内所做的所有更改执行 UPDATE CUBE 语句, 因为最后一个 "应用更改" 操作已提交。The method will execute an UPDATE CUBE statement for all changes made in the XML mapped range since the last apply changes operation was committed. 如果在基于非 OLAP 数据源的范围内执行此方法, 则此方法将生成运行时错误。This method generates a run-time error if it is executed on a range based on a non-OLAP data source. > [!NOTE] > 此方法显示在面向的[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]Excel 2007 项目中的 IntelliSense 中。This method appears in IntelliSense in Excel 2007 projects that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]. 但是, 此方法不能用于 Excel 2007 项目。However, this method cannot be used in Excel 2007 projects.

exception.span: 此属性用于 Excel 2007 项目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Start`|要返回的第一个字符。The first character to be returned. 如果此参数为1或省略, 则此属性将返回以第一个字符开头的一系列字符。If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.| |`Length`|要返回的字符数。The number of characters to be returned. 如果省略此参数, 则此属性将返回字符串的剩余部分 (字符后面的`Start`所有内容)。If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the `Start` character).| 如果尝试在不指定任何参数的情况下使用, 将获取一个对象, 该对象是 Visual Studio 基础结构中的 Office 开发工具的一部分, 不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 您可以使用对象来设置文本字符串中的字符格式。You can use the object to format characters within a text string. 对象不是集合。The object is not a collection. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将粗体格式应用于文本的第一个字符。The following code example uses the property to apply bold formatting to the first character in the text of an . 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未找到`null`匹配项, 则此方法返回。This method returns `null` if no match is found. 此方法不会影响选定内容或活动单元格。This method does not affect the selection or the active cell. 每次使用`LookIn`此`LookAt`方法`SearchOrder`时, `MatchByte`都会保存、、和的设置。The settings for `LookIn`, `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method. 如果未指定这些参数的值, 则在下一次调用方法时, 将使用保存的值。If you do not specify values for these arguments, the next time you call the method the saved values are used. 设置这些参数将更改 "查找" 对话框中的设置, 更改 "查找" 对话框中的设置将更改在省略参数时使用的保存值。Setting these arguments changes the settings in the Find dialog box, and changing the settings in the Find dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments. 若要避免出现问题, 请在每次使用此方法时显式设置这些参数。To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method. 您可以使用和方法来重复搜索。You can use the and methods to repeat the search. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将的值设置为字符串 "smith", 然后使用、 和方法查找字符串为 "smith" 的第一个单元格。The following code example sets the value of an to the string "Smith", and then uses the , , and methods to find the first cell with the string "Smith". 由于始终只包含一个单元格, 因此在每种情况下都找到相同的单元格。Because an always contains exactly one cell, the same cell is found in each case. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件包含一个常数, 则此属性返回该常数。If the control contains a constant, this property returns the constant. 如果控件为空, 则此属性返回一个空字符串。If the control is empty, this property returns an empty string. 如果控件包含公式, 则此属性以字符串的形式返回公式, 该格式与在公式栏中显示的格式相同 (包括等号)。If the control contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign). 如果您将控件的值或公式设置为日期, 则 Microsoft Office Excel 将进行检查以确定该单元格是否已使用日期或时间格式之一进行格式设置。If you set the value or formula of an control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. 否则, Excel 会将数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。If not, Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将的值设置为等于单元格 A1 和 A2 的值之和。The following code example uses the property to set the value of an to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含使用类型`int`的`CustomerAddress1Cell`对应架构元素命名的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可获取 (或设置为) 单个公式或数组。This property gets (or can be set to) a single formula or an array. 如果控件不包含数组公式, 则此属性返回`null`。 If the control does not contain an array formula, this property returns `null`. 如果使用此属性来输入数组公式, 则该公式必须使用 R1C1 引用样式, 而不是 A1 引用样式。If you use this property to enter an array formula, the formula must use the R1C1 reference style, not the A1 reference style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将的值设置为等于单元格 A1 到 A3 的数组之和。The following code example uses the property to set the value of an to equal the sum of the array of cells A1 through A3. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含使用类型`int`的`CustomerAddress1Cell`对应架构元素命名的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件包含常量, 则此属性返回该常量。If the control contains a constant, this property returns that constant. 如果控件为空, 则属性返回空字符串。If the control is empty, the property returns an empty string. 如果控件包含公式, 则属性以字符串的形式返回公式, 其格式与在公式栏中显示的格式相同 (包括等号)。If the control contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign). 如果您将控件的值或公式设置为日期, 则 Microsoft Office Excel 将进行检查以确定该单元格是否已使用日期或时间格式之一进行格式设置。If you set the value or formula of an control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. 否则, 数字格式将更改为默认的短日期数字格式。If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性将的值设置为等于单元格 A1 和 A2 的值之和。The following code example uses the property to set the value of an to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2. 公式根据其运行的系统的语言进行本地化。The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含使用类型`int`的`CustomerAddress1Cell`对应架构元素命名的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerAddress1Cell` with a corresponding schema element of type `int`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|要访问的单元格的索引号, 按从左到右的顺序排列。The index number of the cell you want to access, in order from left to right.| |`ColumnIndex`|一个数字或字符串, 指示要访问的单元格的列号, 从该范围中第一列的1或 "A" 开始。A number or string that indicates the column number of the cell you want to access, starting with either 1 or "A" for the first column in the range.| 如果尝试在不指定任何参数的情况下使用, 将获取一个对象, 该对象是 Visual Studio 基础结构中的 Office 开发工具的一部分, 不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get an object that is part of the Office development tools in Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. `RowIndex` 和`ColumnIndex`参数是相对偏移量。The `RowIndex` and `ColumnIndex` arguments are relative offsets. 换言之, 如果将指定为`RowIndex` 1, 则将返回该范围第一行中的单元, 而不是工作表的第一行。In other words, specifying a `RowIndex` of 1 returns cells in the first row of the range, not the first row of the worksheet. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性选择偏移三列和三行的单元格。The following code example uses the property to select the cell that is offset from an by three columns and three rows. 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 前缀作为字符串返回。The prefix is returned as a string. 尝试将返回的对象强制转换为 char 会导致无效的强制转换异常。Attempting to cast the object returned to a char results in an invalid cast exception. 如果属性为`false`, 则此前缀字符对于文本标签为 ", 或为空。 If the property is `false`, this prefix character is ' for a text label, or blank. 如果属性为`true`, 则此字符对于左对齐标签为 ""; 对于右对齐标签, 为 ^; 对于 "居中" 标签, 则为 ""; 对于重复标签, 则为 "空"。 If the property is `true`, this character is ' for a left-justified label, " for a right-justified label, ^ for a centered label, \ for a repeated label, or blank. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性显示的前缀字符。 The following code example uses the property to display the prefix character for an . 此代码示例假定当前工作表包含一个名为`CustomerLastNameCell`的。This code example assumes that the current worksheet contains an named `CustomerLastNameCell`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件在数据透视表中, 则在显示 "详细信息" 时, 此属性设置为`true`。 If the control is in a PivotTable report, this property is set to `true` if the item is showing detail. 如果控件不在数据透视表中, 则以下语句为 true:If the control is not in a PivotTable report, the following statements are true: - 控件必须位于单个汇总行或列中。The control must be in a single summary row or column. - 如果行或`false`列的任何子级处于隐藏状态, 则此属性返回。This property returns `false` if any of the children of the row or column are hidden. - 将此属性设置`true`为等效于显示摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to showing all the children of the summary row or column. - 将此属性设置`false`为等效于隐藏摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `false` is equivalent to hiding all the children of the summary row or column.
